Title: First structural use of site-cast, alkali-activated slag concrete in China
Source: Proc. Inst. Civ. Eng. Struct. Build.
Abstract: © 2018 ICE Publishing. All Rights Reserved.This paper reports the first structural application of site-cast, alkali-activated slag concrete in China. Special attention was given in this office building project at Chongqing Jianke to quality control, construction procedure and assessment. The experience showed that quality and costs could be successfully managed through careful control of raw materials, suitable selection of admixtures, proper mix proportions and an efficient construction team. It was also found that alkali-activated slag concrete has the potential for use in cold weather. The ambient temperature during construction was at times below 5°C, yet no specific procedures were needed to maintain the temperature or provide additional heat. The project is a useful reference for future structural use of alkali-activated slag concrete.
